Symbol.Script_1D: if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 7 & GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 8 then call "gs_DW_Marker" parameters all endif
Symbol.Script_FWM:
actualGUID = FROM_GUID
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
_autoID = "376A3732-E172-40B3-8214-F2484F32812D" _startID = "80041AB1-E1C0-410B-B164-44222D9A1924" _endID = "AA3FDF9E-2A9C-49B4-A4CD-3385A0B2FDAB" gosub "NewUnitSizesOption_FWM"
_startID = "AA3FDF9E-2A9C-49B4-A4CD-3385A0B2FDAB" _endID = "8ED708E6-51A6-4F2C-BD8E-4EB55BDACF43" gosub "RectFillSettings_FWM"
! ============================================================================== ! Set migration GUID ! ==============================================================================
setmigrationguid actualGUID
! ============================================================================== end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! en ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== ! NewUnitSizesOption ! ============================================================================== "NewUnitSizesOption_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID | actualGUID = _autoID then iWorkUnitLinear = 10 ! DIMUNIT_PROJECT iWorkUnitSillHgt = 10 ! DIMUNIT_PROJECT
iWorkUnitLinearDecimal = 1 iWorkUnitSillHgtDecimal = 1
parameters iWorkUnitLinear = iWorkUnitLinear, iWorkUnitSillHgt = iWorkUnitSillHgt, iWorkUnitLinearDecimal = iWorkUnitLinearDecimal, iWorkUnitSillHgtDecimal = iWorkUnitSillHgtDecimal
actualGUID = _endID endif return
! ============================================================================== ! RectFillSettings ! ============================================================================== "RectFillSettings_FWM": if actualGUID = _startID then if iMarkerShape = 3 then ! SHAPE_FRAGMENT _penContour = 1 bHas = STORED_PAR_VALUE ("gs_cont_pen", _penContour)
gs_fill_pen = _penContour gs_back_pen = 0 parameters gs_fill_pen = gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen = gs_back_pen endif
actualGUID = _endID endif
return
